oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Business of Beef Feedlot Production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Plett, Dave
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: feedlot
business model
economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The objective of this presentation is to provide an overview of the feedlot business model so that veterinarians/production consultants can understand the complexities and challenges that exist, and use this information to identify opportunities for adding tangible value to the beef production system.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2011; 41-42
